patthana23.52:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.52:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.52:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
